ÍÛÛÖ     JANET PLEADS FOR HELP!!    ÕÛÛÎ
ÚÜÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÜÚ
Ú                                      Ú
Ú "I've opened a Travel Agency designedÚ
Ú to assist Humans visiting Habitat -- Ú
Ú especially those visiting for the    Ú
Ú first time."                         Ú
Ú                                      Ú
Ú "But, I've found it difficult to     Ú
Ú describe this world to the folks in  Ú
Ú that world, and I need help. That's  Ú
Ú why I'm sponsoring a contest -- the  Ú
Ú "Habitat for Mere Humans" contest."  Ú
ÚÜÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÜÚ

ÍÛÛÖ "HABITAT FOR MERE HUMANS" RULESÕÛÛÎ
ÚÜÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÜÚ
Ú 1) Deadline for Entries is Friday,   Ú
Ú    April 8, 1988. Entries should be  Ú
Ú    H-mailed to 'Habitravel' and must Ú
Ú    fit on ONE piece of Habitat mail. Ú
Ú 2) Contestants may enter as many     Ú
Ú    times as they wish, but will be   Ú
Ú    eligible to win only one prize.   Ú
Ú 3) All entries become the property   Ú
Ú    of Quantum Computer Services,     Ú
Ú    which reserves the right to adapt,Ú
Ú    use or publish any or all entries.Ú
ÚÜÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÛÜÚ
